content.detailedDescription: Hi me and my friend was driving back from ashford kent uk to wye kent uk i was the passenger my friend was driving we was on country roads in the open at this point when a bright green glow appeared in the sky at first i thought it was a copper comet but this was moving at a slow pace we then stopped the car turned of the engine and put windows down thinking it could be a helicopter but the sound was the sound of a jet engine but a bit more high pitched 4 red light then appeared as the green glow got dimmer this then traveled slowly away from us going behind the car it picked up speed then suddenly stopped the green light wasn't there just 4 red lights then a a bright yellow orange light it then moved left and right as if it was circling something a bright beam of light then shone down from it it was then we thought it would be best to drive away as we were driving off i looked behind and it was moving left and right very fast faster then ive seen any helicopter move ive been trying to work out what this might be as the sound of this was like nothing ive herd before this could be military of anything i would like to know if anybody has any answers of see this to it was a incredible sight unfortunately my phone was dead and my friend didn't have his on him so we couldn't get no footage i was a little shaken up and didnt believe what i was seeing at first i kept asking my friend to describe what he was seeing so i knew what ever it was i was seeing i wasnt the only one
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Strange light mooving slow then changed direction stopped then hoverd with a beam aiming down to earth

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at a traffic light going on a delivery when i noticed a bluish glow off to my left above a gas station and tree line which i found very unusual, as the light turned green i made a left and then an immediate right and pulled over to take a better look, as i pulled over the object started to moved east, i had to move due to traffic as i proceeded to drive forward the object started dropping and heading east, as it dropped below the tree lines i could still see it between the house tops, i followed it for approximately four blocks then i made a left and turned and the object was hovering just above two houses, i had just gotten a new i phone from my daughter a few weeks ago and was not familiar with how to use the camera and video so as i watched the object and tried to take pictures and video of it i observed two other people and a fire engine pulled who had pulled over to take photos and observed the same object, it was a blue glowing light with a purple interior and shaped like a circle but would occasionally change into two circles and moved very slow and silent. it was like something i never heard of or have seen before and i do not know if i would say it was a ufo or an entity or what, all i know is what i seen was real what ever it was. the object was also observed by two of my fellow employees and management,
content.summary: Blue light observed with purple interior, no sound, hovard for about 5 minutes occansionlly changing shape before fading out of sight

content.detailedDescription: At great hill in weymouth, massachusetts looking over the city of boston. looking over to my right at 8:30 pm, saw a red light take off from land or water over near hull. as this triangle got higher into the sky, it had begun to look like a dark triangle with red- orange lights at each corner (3). the triangle was upside down. the triangle had started straight up, then started to arc. as the triangle was descending, it hovered and then ascended again. this had happened 3 times. after this, the object was lost by slowly dimming out and it had look like to fly away from observation position.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Dark triangle, red light at 3 points. looked like upside down triangle.

content.detailedDescription:
It was just before 10 pm and i was out for a quick evening walk. it was quiet,no dogs barking, no sound of cars. i went to the top of valleyview hill overlooking the bicycle trail and skidoo hill. i was facing looking towards the hospital and i noticed a bright glowing light comng over the hills and straight towards the hospital. i first thought of a late night flight to goose bay airport.  i then noticed there weren't any starboard or port lights, it was just glowing silver ovoid. the sky was clear, very intermitten clouds, wind was from the south. it traveled parallel to the bike path past tim hortons and lawrence obrien centre then took a sharp 45 degree angle and flew towards the lower end of the valley before ascending quickly in the sky toards the mountains and disappearing in the high atmosphere.There wasn't any sound.

this isn't my first sighting. i was 12 years old and walking back from warrs pharmacy on hamilton river road in happy valley. i was walking along back to my home at the lower end of hamilton river. it was a friday night about 7pm, a clear, starry december evening. what made me look up towards the evening sky i don't know. i never heard a thing and this thing was huge.It dwarfed the two riverside homes it hovered behind. it was cigar shaped, tapered at the ends, and had a silvery glow and had eight windows. from those windows came a brighter light and first thing i thought was they didn't have curtains to keep out the cold. second was that something was looking at me through those windows. it just hovered there while i watched it about 15 seconds.

it then moved in five jerky parallel movements, each about 100 meters, each movement towards birch island where it continued upriver till i lost sight of it.
content.summary: an evening walk found me standing on valleyview hill just before 10pm. i seen a bright light coming across the mountains and over the hospital and ttm hortons.
content.locationName: Happy Valley-Goose Bay, Newfoundland and Lab

content.detailedDescription:
Monroe, ga feb 2014

around 2030 i was in my basement when my dog, who is usually quiet, started to growl and ran upstairs and wanted outside.  i went upstairs and let him out.  it was then that i noticed two red lights traveling from the ne to the ssw and the red lights slowly pulsated.  i watched as the lights traveled in a straight line at what appeared to be at a low altitude, i thought this is strange because i am a private pilot, a soldier, and a paramedic and rely on staying calm while observing things.  when the two red lights were almost out of sight, i saw a longer line of about 6 lights, the front 3 were red, the 4th was bigger and white and did not pulsate like the red lights, and the remaining two red lights followed.  it did not make any noise that i could hear and was not like any aircraft that i have ever been exposed to.  when my wife came home a few days later i told her about this event and she thought i was pulling her leg.  since the sighting i have gone outside every night trying to see them again so i can video the lights to prove what i saw.  the whole time the lights were present i just kept thinking that this is strange and fascinating at the same time.  i made mental notes of what i saw and what i did not see.  i did not notice any strobes as on modern aircraft, i didn't see any trail of any kind, and i noticed that the lights appeared to be traveling slower than the other aircraft in the area at the time.  the other aircraft were singular and had the red, green and white strobes while the lights i saw pulsated slowly, except for the white light on the second set of lights which never pulsated.  after a few minutes the lights traveled out of my sight.
content.summary: Dog started growling and wanted outside, once outside, at night, i noticed the lights which were not like aircraft lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking off from houston airport and noticed this blue sphere about 200 feet from us on the right side of the plane. it was going just a little slower than us and stayed in sight for about 20 seconds  when we landed in chicago i asked the pilot and co-pilot if they saw a blue sphere on the right side of the plane both said "we were looking on the left side and didn't see anything. the reason i'm sending this in now is because i haven't seen anyone else reporting seeing a 10foot solid blue sphere. i'm asking you if you get any reports of this type of ufo. it wasn't a weather balloon it was a cubbie blue 10foot sphere with no seams or any propulsion system showing yet it stayed in my sight for about 20 seconds
content.summary: Taking off from houston airport i saw a blue sphere 10feet in diameter about 200 feet from us accending  right along with our plane for about 30 seconds s

content.detailedDescription:
I had just left my house (3473 eisenhower road, columbus ohio) walking south on eisenhower road to meet a friend. it was a clear night and i looked up and saw a basketball sized white oval object. it was almost directly over me moving quite slowly heading south. i continued to watch it until i got down to eisenhower road and oakland park ave. there i met my friend who had come from his house. we were going to the local drug store to have a milkshake. i pointed out the object to my friend who saw it moving. we watched it for maybe 20-25 seconds when a small prop plane approached from the south heading northeast. this plane had it's wing lights blinking and we could hear the engine. when the plane was in close proximity to the object the object just disappeared. it was like watching a light bulb that was bright and then the light bulb was turned off. 

we continued on to the drug store and had our milkshake. we was there for about 30 minutes. when we started walking home we began to hear jet aircraft zooming around in the sky. i was an air force brat so i knew they sounded like jet fighters. it should be noted that lockbourne afb, was located on the far southeast side of columbus. where i lived (north side of columbus) i had never heard military aircraft in the air before that night. i felt that they must be looking for the object that i had seen. when i got home i told my mom and dad what i had seen and heard. my dad was a 20 year retired air force officer. he said that it was very odd for jet fighters to be flying over our end of town because that was not in there flight pattern. my dad had been stationed at lockbourne before retiring. 

being 16 years old i was quite excited of what i witnessed so i asked my parents if i could call the base. they told me to go ahead and call them. i looked up the base's number in our phone book. i got through and asked to talk to the duty officer. i then was connected to an officer and told him my story. he asked me a few questions and then told me thanks and hung up.  

tonight (02/23/2014) i had just got done watching one of your shows on the history channel. i just thought that you should be made aware of my sighting back in 1966. i'm a retired 24 year af security police veteran  and 18 year federal police detective. this incident really impacted me and still does.
content.summary: Walking down street looked up and saw it moving very slowly directly over me heading south.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were fishing out in the country, about a couple miles from the city line at a canal about 4pm. we were there about an hour when i looked to the south and seen this dome like object hovering toward us. it was about 300-400 feet south of us and about 75-100 feet above ground. as i stared at it for about a minute and i asked my daughter, what is that? we both stared at it as it was hovering really slow toward us. after we couldn't figure what it was and confirmed something i've never seen before, i told my daughter to reel her line in as i did. our toyota pickup had a sliding window on back of cab. i started to drive forward at first as i didn't want to head toward it by going into reverse but realized i'd be heading out farther into the country if i went forward. as i drove in reverse and seeing it thru window of truck, i seen it change in direction and started hovering to the east. as i got onto the paved road and am now looking to the east, i did not see it anymore. when my daughter and i arrived at home, my wife was outside and saw us get out of the truck and noticed something was wrong as i was scared and somewhat in shock and confused. she says it was written all over my face that something had happened or was wrong. i have only mentioned it to a few people as i didn't or still don't think anybody would probably beleive me althou i think most would simply because anyone that knows me, knows i am an honest person. i know it's been a long time but have always been willing for someone to hypnotize me about this incident so even myself could see what all reactions, descriptions and or any info we may gather from what my daughter and i witnessed that day? i now live in wisconsin. thank you. jose
content.summary: Dome with giant looking windows. not transparent looking windows.

content.detailedDescription: It was around 9 to 9:30pm when my wife said we had ran out of diapers for my daughter so we went to our nearest target store. it was a regular, clear sky, warm and humid night, typical of florida. as we arrived, we parked our car and began to walk towards the store when suddenly both my wife and i stopped and stayed speechless, i as well as my wife were in such amazement and shock that we froze as we staired at the sky when she suddenly said "do u see that"? i grasped for air and said "yes" we didnt know what it was, we saw a ballon like object, round in shape with a dark bright redish color in the rim around it and as you looked towards the midle it was a glowing orange/yellow color that remained steady without change in color. my wife suggested it was a helicopter, i said no because 1) there was absolutely no sound and 2 it did not have a flash on the tail of waht would be a helicopter. then she said a small aircraft, again there was absolutely no sound and it moved too smoothly and slow to be an aircraft of our known experience. all of the sudden a guy behind us screamed wtf! we are being invaded and took off running but my wife and i ramained frozen looking at the object when all of the sudden another replica of that same sphere seemed to have came out of the one we were looking at, same size, shape and colors, then anither and another and anither till we saw a total of about 5-7. my wife said to me film it with your cell phone as other people stood in amazement, others panicked, so i did, i tried to catch a footage. as the objects flew kver us the distance from the ground up must have been that of maybe 100 floors up. the objects were seen very clearly and even seemed at times as if they were floating east bound very slowly. suddenly the object as it continued its straigh path moved towards the beach, (east) and the lights behind it that were in a cormation of 1 on top other lower on bottom started to gather together connecting each other, kind of like if they were going inside each other until we only saw 2 lights and disappeared over the target building. i heard people saying, "did you get that" but amazingly and weird my phone nust like others had a black screen with no sound or image, kind of like if my cell phone was turned off. we never understood what it was, we told our family and they thought we were crazy, other members said "u never know" interestingly an uncle suggested it could of been a paper ballon like the ones asians make but if that was the case ut would of flew up and not accross, there was no wind, and 2 it wouldnt of had the colors of glow we saw that day. my wife and i brushed it off for a while because we even thought we must be seeing things from our imagintion but about 8 months later as we were watching tv news briefs we saw a news that sid "caught ufo's footage flying over the sea of south florida. when we saw the inages we saw exactly the same thing we saw that night and ever since then we became aware that we have seen somthing. what did we see? we dont know, all we know it was very close, glowing, bright beautiful color mix, silent and kind of floating.
content.summary: 1yellow/orange/red ballon like object that expelled 5-6 other ballonlike objects out of it w/out sound hovering over the city towards the beach.

content.detailedDescription: I had just finished my shift as a cab driver. i was going home. i went to go onto i95 from castor ave in philadelphia. it was just turning daylight. i saw a sphere of light that was huge. it seemed like it came out of the delaware river which is near to i95 at that point. i sped up i95. it seemed to match my speed and stayed right with me. i saw it outside the passenger window. it also seemed to communicate to something inside me. it was just an eerie feeling. anyway, i went to turn off woodhaven rd exit off of i95. at that point, it seemed to go higher in the sky and it just blinked off. it was like someone just flicked a light switch. i worked again that night and the next morning went to pick up the day driver. he was sick the day before; i picked him up on castor ave and was explaining to him what i had witnessed the previous morning; as if right on cue, the light came up the exact same way that it did the previous morning. it followed the exact same routine including blinking off at woodhaven rd exit. the day driver saw the same thing that i did. this happened in 1997. i was watching your show named the buck's county flap and it reminded me of that incident. you could possibly go there now at say 5am in the morning and you might be able to see the same thing that i did. why would it change its seemingly daily routine regardless of the time that has passed. i don't reside in philadelphia anymore or i would look for myself. the other witness still resides in philadelphia.
content.summary: It was a bright sphere of light perhaps over 250 feet in diameter

content.detailedDescription: I saw object in skie, i stop my car took a picture i try to take a few more pictures the object completely disappear. it was about 10:30 am the sun directly visible, so that object was not the sun.
content.summary: Observe in skie for 10 second.

content.detailedDescription: While watching daytona 500 today. martin truex had just blown a motor the race truned to comerical. when the show came back on air there were several jets flying close to the track. the cameras were following the jets. behind the jets were 2 buzzards flying in distance. the camera moves to the front of the jets, there was a silver round object that you can see movving into clouds. this shot does not last long but i have it taped and watched it several times to make sure of what i saw. not saying it is anything unkown, just like to know what it was. thank you
content.summary: Nascar datona race camera following jets close to track this happened when they came back from comerical there are 2 buzzards behind the jets and a round looking silver object infront of the jets it kinda goes into clouds.

content.detailedDescription: Was preparing for bed closing my window when i saw what looked like approx. 11 or 12 very bright lights with one red light in the center sort of in a triangle formation.  no noise, flying low, barely making it over an nearby apartment building.  moving very quickly, when got to the building they all tilted together to go over building.  i was very upset and could not sleep and am still very shaken over this.  was not a believer.  not sure what i saw but know 100% not an commercial aircraft.  i could no longer see when it cleared a building.  was amazed that something so low had no sound coming from it.
content.summary: Very bright approx 12 yellow lights with one red formation

content.detailedDescription:
This is my grandfather's story,
he was sitting in his recliner watching basketball on tv, he then noticed a small light out the bay window going in a straight path traveling north in the east sky over the hill across town. after a few moments he then witnessed three longer cigar shaped lights traveling the same line. he first thought was that the first light was a plane with its landing lights on that would circle around before heading into the county to the south, we see that from time to time. he thought this until he noticed the three larger cigar shaped lights that seemed to be following it. they were moving very slowly. what he thought was strange was that there weren't any blinking lights at all. he continued to watch these lights for about fifteen minutes and they got behind some pine trees in his viewing way. after that they disappeared. he assumes they went east and did it quickly. he isn't very rattled from the sighting just curious about what he saw.
content.summary: First light was small circle, the other three were longer heading north then east

content.detailedDescription: I was at recess on our school ground when i noticed this object come out of the clouds. it was a partly cloudy day, the sun was shining when i saw it. 4 others in my class also saw it but i can't remember who they were. i thought at first it was the moon, because it had a patchwork of dark areas just like the moon. but this round object was spinning as it came out of a cloud, hovered for about 30 seconds then receded back into the cloud. i realize i was young when i sighted this thing but it left quite an impression. i reported it to my teacher and was pretty much blown off.
content.summary: I was in 2nd grade. saw this object while on school ground at recess. appeared out of the clouds, hovered, was spinning, disappeared back into clouds after about 30 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
On feb. 19th, 2014 at ~2000 i went outside to gas up our backup generator. after starting the generator i looked up at the sky toward the sw (239-degrees magnetic) at about 20 to 30 degrees above the horizon. i noticed a white-yellow light which i initially assumed to be a planet setting in the west, due to the size and brightness of the light.

i nearly turned away when i noticed the light was actually two lights that blinked simultaneously. the lights were situated in a left-right orientation and blinked about every three seconds (i did not time the interval). i noticed that this pair of lights appeared to be moving, but very slowly. i used our laundry line post as a reference to the lights' motion and was surprised when the lights blinked directly over the post corner and upon the subsequent blink were located about a foot to the right of my reference corner. every subsequent blink the pair of lights was sighted at a different location: back to the corner, a foot to the right, or right between the two location points. i was standing perfectly still. i could not determine any shape of the craft(s). the flashing lights moved very slowly to the west. 

i went into the house to get a pair of binoculars and re-acquired the lights out my back living room door. i could never get a very good focus on the lights and after a few minutes they were out of my sight. during the entire sighting i could hear no engine noises or any sound coming from the direction of the flashing lights.

this is the first time i have ever witnessed what could be called an unexplained light(s) or craft(s). i am a licensed pilot and i know what strobes, navigation lights, and landing lights look like on a conventional aircraft.
content.summary: Observed paired lights flashing in unison every few seconds moving slowly with no apparent sound

content.detailedDescription:
Sorry i can't write english good, so i will write in german.

also als ich vor meiner haust���r ging um zu gucken ob der pizza man da ist (ich hatte pizza bestellt deshalb bin ich nach drausen gegangen) hab ich zwei lichter gesehn im himmel, erstmal nur ein und dann noch ein zweites. das war so hell das ich dahin gucken musste.. ich wei��� nicht ob das wirklich ein ufo war aber ich wei��� das es kein stern war! weil sterne nicht farbig blinken ..
content.summary: Flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: Witness (a) and witness (b) were looking out the bathroom window which is facing east.  observed a stationary orange/red colored light to the ne for approximately 1 minute.  the object just hovered above the woods at about 8:19 pm.  they watched it for a min and it disappeared before their eyes.  they continued to watch and it briefly re-appeared approximately two miles to the east of the original sighting above the tree line.  it hovered there for a few seconds then disappeared again.
content.summary: Stationary orange/red light, tree top level, seen in two locations 2 miles apart.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out my bedroom window when i seen fireball like irbs come from behind the mountain. they moved in syn up and down for about 15 minute a black helicopter flew over my house toward the lights once it reached them they just faded out except for two setting horizontal in mid air after a brief stare down between the orbs and the helicopter the light faded completely..
content.summary: I seen hundreds of red fireball like orbs moving in sync up and by the mountain for about 15 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
Was heading south on clearview expressway in queens ny around 12 am. saw a dozen or so red lights in sky. pulled off highway to get video. video was not so great. objects hovered stationary to slow movement, not in any conventional formation but just clustered together. over course of few minutes they headed north together almost out of sight because of trees. then they started headed back the opposite direction one by one in single file. man comes up to me towards end of video and is wondering about them too. he speculates that they are helicopters. i have lived in queens almost my whole life, near jfk airport, la guardia airport, i see planes and  helicopters everyday, never seen anything like this. maybe drones i don't know. the oddest thing i find about this is that this is taking place around 12 midnight on a sunday!? who is doing maneuvers that time of night? the camera does not pick up so well they are a bright orange/red color, the blinking in the video was not so obvious in person but is picked up by camera. we had seen these same lights the previous weekend over long island nassau county around 10 pm but could not get video.
maybe video needs to be played in opposite/negative color to see better? i do not have any editing software to see better.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw many bright red lights cluistered in sky, hovered, then changed direction

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving southbound on nave dr, novato, ca heading towards safeway (cross street bel marin keys blvd) when we both observed a bright orange glowing light straight in front of us, in the distance, about 50 degrees elevation. the sky was clear. at first, i thought it might be the light atop of mt. tamalpais, but my wife said no, it is too big, closer, and you cannot observe the top of the mountain from our vantage point. it seemed out of place, and my second thought was it must be a plane or helicopter. we pulled into the safeway parking lot, got out of the car and while walking inside, i looked at the light again to take note that it was still in the sky about the same distance as before. we went inside and shopped for about 20 minutes at the most. we got back into our car, and headed south again on nave dr toward marinwood. we saw what appeared to be the same light in the sky again, south of us, only it appeared to be closer and larger. while my wife drove, we asked each other, "what is that?". i rolled down the window to observe the light as we drove. my wife turned left onto main gate road and into a parking lot on the right. we both got out of the car and observed the light in the distance, hovering. it looked closer than our first observation, but still high up and in the distance. it was high enough in the sky not to be obstructed by the surrounding hillsides. i was very excited and curious as i watched the light pulsate an orangish, red, yellow. we observed the light for about 45 seconds once we were out of the car. the light than abruptly disappeared, it seemed to shut off. i thought i saw a smaller light greyish colored object move west at the point where the bright light was, until i could see nothing but empty sky. i considered taking a cell phone photo of the light but did not want to be fussing with my phone and miss the opportunity to observe the light. i felt a sense of extreme curiosity and excitement to see this light. having observed the iss and other satellites on several occasions, i found this sighting to be very different.
content.summary: Orange, pulsating, glowing light hovering above

content.detailedDescription: While unloading our car , sharon noticed 4 white to silver reflective circular objects , not birds about  2-5 miles  move then eastward. pointed out the objects to her husband what she was seeing since both of us are experienced birders, they were not seagulls. they were very reflective to silver and moving silently very fast due east as the same altitude, 3 objects  disappeared and reappeared catching light from the sun and disappearing ne in a flight pattern not used by commercial aircraft. we were unable to get binoculars out in time to delineate their shape but about 10  minutes later a prop single engine plane out of  thomasville was seen heading east which was about 500 ft and moving about 140 miles per hour also seen due n of us and  appeared 3 times larger.
content.summary: 4 silver to white reflective circular objects seen circling due n and then moving very fast to east intermittently appearing and disappearing in a flight pattern not seen for commercial aircraft

content.detailedDescription: Livin at athelstone south australia  out in the back yard at around the age of 7/8 with my father brother and neighbour,witnessed a cigar shaped at front and wing shaped at rear fly over the black hill ranges .As it flew over the hill it  flew down matching the shape of the. hill,stopped and hovered for 5 to 15 seconds ,descended some more to about 50 to 80 foot and rapidly moved right about 1km in a flash and back to near the same position wher it left.It did this approximately 3 times until it was nearly level with us.It was about 2blocks away from us then and could see what appeared to be windows /portholes of a large size with a entity  shadow in said window.My father was about to light a backyard incinerator which were common in everyone's back yard at that era and is the first time that i have seen a look of worry on my fathers face in my lifetime which in tern made me  crap my self to.With my fathers words"we will quickly light this it might scare them off" he lit the incinerator and it kept cruising at about the same speed which was about 30km/hr then shot off at a rapid pace till it was just a blip in the sky.My father has been in the raf and when came to australia  was doing defence work for the raaf and never has seen anything like it in his lifetime evan up to this very day.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw ufo fly over top of black hill range and decend  stopping momentarily and moving about 1 km in a zig zag motion.

content.detailedDescription: I was not present during this sighting but i have been in the past for these types of orange orb objects. my girlfriend captured this with her camera while i was away with friends in another part of town.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: My girlfriend captured this orange orb ufo just as it took off. during a fireworks show.

content.detailedDescription:
It's been over 3 years since this event went down, and i'm only now trying to get this out there because i just discovered the mufon site. 

it was around 10 p.M at night, and me and two of my friends we're hanging out by a fire in my buddies backyard. somehow i remember the conversation turning to u.F.O's and the existence of aliens and the such. at the time, i had just begun to dive headfirst into researching everything about their existence, and within the year before this incident i had already seen upwards of a dozen u.F.O sightings while attending the university of miami as a sophomore. many of which i had been able to summon via directing out loving thoughts to the cosmos and to various races of et's (pleaidian , arcturian, andromedan, etc). yes, i summoned them with my thoughts. this isn't some b.S ego trip. i would think loving thoughts and send them out towards the cosmos and spend night on the rooftop of our apartment complex staring out into space. and every night i'd do this, at least one ufo would appear in some shape or form. 

anyways, once my friends said they were non-believers, i simply mentally asked  our galactic family to show up and prove that they do exist. i didn't expect them to actually show up, especially for the sheer amount that they did. i'm not sure how unique this ability is, but needless to say it worked repeatedly and consistently. 

one by one, in an almost choo-choo train like fashion, seemingly out of nowhere, we spotted at first one large, glowing orb that was pulsating white and yellow. if you were to hold a golfball up to the sky, i'd say that would have covered it.  it was moving really slowly about several hundred feet over my friends house, moving east to west. then about somewhere between 35-50 feet behind the first one, appeared another... then another... and another... i estimate that there was somewhere between 30-50 u.F.O's in this line altogether, each following along the same distinct pattern, all moving slowly in unison, hovering along in one line. they all shared the same white/yellow pulsating color pattern as well. none of them sped up past on another. it reminded me of the macy's day parade, as if each orb was a float, just parading right overhead us.  this went on for about 10-15 minutes, until they stopped appearing, finally fading out of site to the west of us. 

i still kick myself to this day for not thinking to record it on my phone, but i think i was too dumbfounded and in awe of the sheer beauty and love i had felt upon witnessing so many u.F.O's. my friends were in disbelief to say the least. it felt that the u.F.O's were intentionally hovering by so slowly as if to say to my friends, "do you believe now?". out of all my sightings, this was by far and away the most incredible spectacle i have ever seen.
content.summary: Large fleet of ufo's over webster, ny

content.detailedDescription: My close friend and i were travelling west on highway 127 coming into crossville, ironically we had been discussing ufo-watching with some friends earlier. we noticed some blinky lights off the left and start watching closely, and we noticed it was travelling pretty slow. about that time we noticed that it was uncomfortably close, so i pulled over and we watched this craft basically hover right over us (east) and past us. we were travelling about 55 mph when we noticed the craft. it appeared massive in comparison to us, and of course our cell phone video caught no detail. the craft was seemed to be lined with yellow and red and some lights which shimmered in a weird way which was unlike the blinking lights of an airplane, where some yellow lights seemed not to waver in intensity. additionally there appeared to be beams of light coming from the bottom of the craft which were much dimmer but larger, it literally looked like two search lights were mounted on it. shortly after it passed by we continued home and called our above-mentioned friends (at exactly 10:35 pm), who immediately flipped out because they had also seen a ufo shortly before, in a different location, travelling in a different direction. additionally i called my brother, who also watches, who also flipped out, as he had seen something funky in the skies half a county away in harriman earlier tonight. i cannot personally give a witness's account on the latter two sightings, and i doubt my friends will take the time to fill out a report, but there is no doubt in my mind whatsoever that what we say was not an airplane or done of any known making. our video is included as well as the other from crossville tonight, neither of which are substantial in my unprofessional opinion.
content.summary: The craft was hovering less than 100 ft off the ground in the opposite direction we were travelling, flashy trippy lights, so close it was unreal, no doubt.

content.detailedDescription: Looking for a iss flyover scheduled for 7:55 pm looking east ( comm. jet traffic lane above apt ).  only had in my binocs on it for 30 seconds or so.  lost sight of it due to roof.  went to the east facing window and removed screen and could not reacquire target.  possible balloon but i checked wind speed and direction and it was calm.  it was barely visible to the naked eye.  it either reflected ambient city light or was glowing slightly.  faint yellowish color.  my wife was aware of my observations but did not see it.  if it was a decorative balloon then why did i not see it after it passed directly overhead?
content.summary: 7x35nikon binocs looking 85 deg. no wind, diamond shape traveling steady slow speed, glowed faint yellow.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a light go by the road outside my house, looked like and emergency vehicle. looked out the front window and noticed how clear the sky was. looking at the stars, picked out orion's belt. noticed a triangular formation of lights at high altitude moving south to north. 

it took approximately 10 to 20 secs to cover horizon to horizon, and as it passed over head it appeared to be a solid triangular mass. red lights on corners, and silent. est altitude around 30,000 feet or so. no trails, no sound. dogs in the area were barking as it came into the area and after it left. 

the object flew in a straight line. lost sight of the object as it cross the horizon to the north.
content.summary: Large black triangle high altitude, red lights on corners, traveled south to north.

content.detailedDescription: I was pulling up to my apt then i looked in the sky and saw light moving in different directions at high speeds someone else in my apts saw it but i was so awe struck the i only got a few seconds of footage but in the film you can see how fast it's going it goes by fast so the film will need to be slowed down it about 2 seconds long of a recording
content.summary: I saw light flying at high rates of speed in different directions

content.detailedDescription: So i walked out for a smoke, and of course to check the stars for activity, when i look up toward the east, ( which from my house) is about 5 miles to the ocean i notice 2 red-orange objects moving in formation west, then one burns out then the other. then here comes two more over the horizon from the same direction-( the coast ), one burns out rather quick, the other continues on a westward path then it burns out. none of these objects changed elevation or speed. then a final one coming from the same direction moving to the west again and it burns out. all these burn out in different spots, no marker lights, its dark out, no clouds, high flying airliners thousands of feet above. there were no flashes or noise, the brightness and color remained the same through the duration of sighting.
content.summary: Red orange lights coming from the the coast moving west
